meanings.definition: The act of placing a cap or cover on something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully placed the cappings on the bottles.
meanings.sent2: The cappings on the jars kept the contents fresh.
meanings.sent3: The cappings on the jars played hide and seek with the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: The cappings on the bottles were like little hats for the drinks.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cappings sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The uppermost layer or covering of something.
meanings.sent1: The cappings of snow on the mountain glistened in the morning light.
meanings.sent2: The cappings of icing on the cake made it look delicious.
meanings.sent3: The cappings of leaves on the tree rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The cappings of clouds in the sky created beautiful patterns.
meanings.sent5: The cappings of dust on the old book showed its age.

meanings.definition: The process of sealing or closing off something.
meanings.sent1: The cappings of the bottle ensured the liquid stayed inside.
meanings.sent2: The cappings of the envelope kept the letter safe.
meanings.sent3: The cappings of the jar pretended to be a fortress.
meanings.sent4: The cappings of the door locked away the secrets.
meanings.sent5: The cappings of the box secured its contents.

meanings.definition: The act of finishing or completing something.
meanings.sent1: The cappings of the project were the final touches.
meanings.sent2: The cappings of the painting brought it to life.
meanings.sent3: The cappings of the puzzle danced together in harmony.
meanings.sent4: The cappings of the story tied up all loose ends.
meanings.sent5: The cappings of the performance left the audience in awe.
